channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Active Directory
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Active Directory

item.title: CVE-2017-0164|2024-08-05T12:55:19.275Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- active%20directory
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in Windows 10 1607 and Windows Server 2016 Active Directory when an authenticated attacker sends malicious search queries, aka "Active Directory Denial of Service Vulnerability."
